title: Five Hearts Under One Roof
description: Yuman’s, the player, once solitary home and routine are now invaded by five beautiful women! Each has her unique charm– the 'childhood friend of 20 years,' the 'first love and former idol,' the 'demanding boss,' the 'bold younger girl,' and the 'shy recluse.' Who will you choose?
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Plot
<!--text-->
 is a fully immersive interactive video game that simulates a love story with five unique heroines. As the player, you take on the role of Yuman, who has always been home alone. Now, you’ll be running a lively, love-filled boarding house with five fascinating heroines.

Who will be by your side in the end?

<!--image-->
![Five Hearts Under One Roof-1u27v](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/6b211baddecd4526a95438db45166835/five-hearts-under-one-roof-1u27v.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
**The First Resident: Your Childhood Friend of 20 Years - Mal-sook Go**

> *“Are you really just going to be friends with me?”*

<!--image-->
![Five Hearts Under One Roof-ly6rt](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/6b211baddecd4526a95438db45166835/five-hearts-under-one-roof-ly6rt.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
**The Second Resident: Your First Love and Former Idol - Min-jung Park**

> *“I don’t want to be just a singer and fan with you.”*

<!--image-->
![Five Hearts Under One Roof-1lbau](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/6b211baddecd4526a95438db45166835/five-hearts-under-one-roof-1lbau.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
**The Third Resident: Your Demanding Boss - Gran Dong**

> *“Cute, Yuman, you like things like this?”*

<!--image-->
![Five Hearts Under One Roof-91mdw](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/6b211baddecd4526a95438db45166835/five-hearts-under-one-roof-91mdw.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
**The Fourth Resident: The Bold and Forward Younger Girl - Eun-bi Go**

> *“I’ve come to marry you!”*

<!--image-->
![Five Hearts Under One Roof-129qk](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/6b211baddecd4526a95438db45166835/five-hearts-under-one-roof-129qk.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
**The ??th Resident: The Adorable Recluse - Seung-yi Jo**

> *“I’ve been saved.”*

Which of these five unique and captivating heroines will steal your heart?
Or… *could it be that your true love lies with someone unexpected?*

<!--image-->
![Five Hearts Under One Roof-fap59](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/6b211baddecd4526a95438db45166835/five-hearts-under-one-roof-fap59.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
**Immersive First-Person Romance Simulation**
: From start to finish, you experience the game through the protagonist’s eyes. You’ll make crucial decisions and choices in response to the diverse and captivating events that come your way. This is more than just a simple dating sim – your choices lead to a variety of events and unfolding romances.

<!--image-->
![Five Hearts Under One Roof-1a04o](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/6b211baddecd4526a95438db45166835/five-hearts-under-one-roof-1a04o.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
**Rich Storyline**
: With numerous story branches and multiple endings, there’s a wealth of narrative content waiting for you. Hidden epilogues and bonus videos in each chapter provide a deeper romantic simulation experience. Unexpected choices can unlock new video routes, adding layers of surprise to your journey.

<!--image-->
![Five Hearts Under One Roof-6ch0e](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/6b211baddecd4526a95438db45166835/five-hearts-under-one-roof-6ch0e.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
**Natural Acting and High-Quality Visuals**
: The charming portrayals of the five heroines evoke genuine romantic emotions, making it feel like a real-life love story. The development team, already well-acquainted with the heroines, brings a high level of synergy to the game, ensuring an authentic and engaging experience.

<!--image-->
![Five Hearts Under One Roof-g0nc7](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/6b211baddecd4526a95438db45166835/five-hearts-under-one-roof-g0nc7.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
**Irresistible Heroines**
: From the sweet girl-next-door and the tsundere to the shy recluse and the bold go-getter, the heroines come in various charming personalities and ages – older, younger, and peers. Each one offers a unique and compelling love story for you to explore.
